meanings.sent1: After the rain, I had to rewash my car to remove the mud.
meanings.sent2: I always rewash my clothes if they still smell after the first wash.
meanings.sent3: She decided to rewash the dishes because she missed a spot.
meanings.sent4: The artist rewashed the canvas to create a lighter background.
meanings.sent5: The chef rewashing the lettuce made sure it was perfectly clean for the salad.

meanings.definition: The act of washing something again.
meanings.sent1: The rewashing of the car took extra time but made it sparkle.
meanings.sent2: I don't mind a rewashing of the windows to keep them streak-free.
meanings.sent3: The rewashing of the clothes seemed never-ending on laundry day.
meanings.sent4: The rewashing of the driveway after the storm was necessary to clear the debris.
meanings.sent5: The rewashing of the dog was a challenge, but it was worth it for his fluffy coat.
